summary: a new Loading screen!! Be fascinated from the HD pictures! No boring smoke anymore!!!
descriptionHtml:
------------------------------------------
----------WHAT DOES IT DO-------
------------------------------------------
It changes the Loadingscreen between the missions to new, random pictures!

--------HOW TO INSTALL?--------

extract the files to skyrim\\\\data

than check the box in datafiles on the skyrim launcher


-------HOW TO REMOVE?------

simply delete it :D
author: Ganga
